content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: green_terracotta
inventory=[{"type": "netherrack", "quantity": 25, "index": 12}, {"type": "orange_wool", "quantity": 15, "index": 14}, {"type": "red_bed", "quantity": 1, "index": 18}, {"type": "composter", "quantity": 23, "index": 23}, {"type": "zombie_villager_spawn_egg", "quantity": 4, "index": 24}, {"type": "ghast_tear", "quantity": 42, "index": 26}, {"type": "cactus", "quantity": 1, "index": 27}, {"type": "quartz_block", "quantity": 61, "index": 34}, {"type": "slime_ball", "quantity": 25, "index": 42}, {"type": "terracotta", "quantity": 8, "index": 43}]
thought: To craft green_terracotta, I need to craft green_dye first. To craft green_dye, I need to smelt cactus. I will smelt the cactus in slot 27 into slot 11.
Ok
act: smelt from slot 27 to slot 11 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: green_terracotta
inventory=[{"type": "green_dye", "quantity": 1, "index": 11}, {"type": "netherrack", "quantity": 25, "index": 12}, {"type": "orange_wool", "quantity": 15, "index": 14}, {"type": "red_bed", "quantity": 1, "index": 18}, {"type": "composter", "quantity": 23, "index": 23}, {"type": "zombie_villager_spawn_egg", "quantity": 4, "index": 24}, {"type": "ghast_tear", "quantity": 42, "index": 26}, {"type": "quartz_block", "quantity": 61, "index": 34}, {"type": "slime_ball", "quantity": 25, "index": 42}, {"type": "terracotta", "quantity": 8, "index": 43}]
thought: I now have green_dye in slot 11. I need to craft green_terracotta next. To do that, I need to move terracotta into the crafting grid. I will move the terracotta in slot 43 into slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 43 to slot 1 with quantity 1
